levels.description: The ground floor is designed for industrial use with commercial spaces and utility areas. It incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring entrance from the south or east as per local traditions, aligning workspaces towards a positive energy flow.

features: Open layout to allow visibility and natural ventilation
Utility connections compliant with industrial regulations

openings.location: South or East facing as per Vastu recommendation

notes: Design incorporates local building norms including setback distances and fire safety measures.
Vastu principles have been integrated by aligning the main entrance to a favorable direction (south/east) and placing utility rooms in less auspicious directions.

levels.description: The upper floor is designed as a residential duplex with a 2BHK layout that maintains a balance between industrial aesthetics and domestic comfort.

rooms.purpose: Common area for relaxation and socializing
features: Floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the commercial ground floor below
Integrated with living area for open plan layout

openings.location: Main staircase or elevator exit aligned per local building norms and Vastu compliance
Adjacent to living room for optimal light

notes: Residential spaces incorporate both industrial design elements and domestic comforts.
Natural ventilation is enhanced by strategically placed openings and floor-to-ceiling windows.
